# Summon Dire Hawk (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[Sky (Domain)|Sky 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One summoned dire hawk

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of the Wild (WotC), pg. 175

This spell summons a dire hawk. It appears where you designate and acts immediately, on your turn. You may command the dire hawk telepathically as a free action, allowing you to direct its actions as you desire.
